tokens.name: CLIENT_NAME
tokens.prompt: Please enter your client bot's username
tokens.description: Name of the WickrIO Bot client

tokens.name: LISTEN_PORT
tokens.prompt: Please enter your client bot's port
tokens.description: The TCP/IP port this integration will listen to

tokens.name: API_KEY
tokens.prompt: Please enter your client bot's API-Key
tokens.description: The API key that is sent in every request

tokens.name: API_AUTH_TOKEN
tokens.prompt: Please create an Web API Basic Authorization Token(we recommend an alphanumeric string with at least 24 characters)
tokens.description: The authentication string used to generate the Base64 value to be sent in the authorization field of the HTTP Header

tokens.name: HTTPS_CHOICE
tokens.prompt: Do you want to set up an HTTPS connection with the Web API Interface (Recommended)(y/n)

tokens.name: SSL_KEY_LOCATION
tokens.prompt: Please enter the name and location of your SSL .key file
tokens.description: Full path name of the .key file (only required if you are going to use HTTPS).

tokens.name: SSL_CRT_LOCATION
tokens.prompt: Please enter the name and location of your SSL .crt file
tokens.description: Full path name of the .cert file (only required if you are going to use HTTPS).
